events.desc: As winter thaws, life springs new from the ground, and the eternal cycle begins again.

rares.name: lily of the vale
rares.desc: A scented white flower, worn for luck.

resources.name: bees
resources.desc: Bees have unexpected uses in spells of life and generation.

resources.name: hyacinth
resources.desc: A colorful and poisonous spring bloom.
resources.flavor: I could not speak, and my eyes failed, I was neither living nor dead, and I knew nothing.

resources.name: bees
resources.desc: Bees have unexpected uses in spells of life and generation.

upgrades.name: portal of trees
upgrades.desc: A portal of tree trucks grows from the ground. If you could activate it, you might learn where the beasts came from.

upgrades.name: queen mab's carriage
upgrades.desc: A fairie-carriage carved from an enchanted chestnut.

upgrades.name: beeswax candle
upgrades.desc: A candle with a refreshing aroma.

tasks.name: spring rites
tasks.desc: Call on satyrs and dryads to weave spells about your maypole.

skills.desc: Beekeeping has surprising uses in the magic of life and creation.

encounters.name: stargazing
encounters.desc: Bright spring skies bring new stars into view.

encounters.name: idle rumors
encounters.desc: Every year rumors abound of lights and music from the nearby woods.

encounters.name: evening dances
encounters.desc: With warmer weather and lighter skies, the celebrations last long into the night.

encounters.name: festive fires
encounters.desc: As evening fades to night, revellers kindle fires to continue the festivities.

encounters.name: maypole dance
encounters.desc: Young women from Aylesmeade weave patterns of colored ribbons around a bare trunk.

encounters.name: potted flowers
encounters.desc: Aylesmeade villagers arrange their spring blooms for sale.

encounters.name: goblin market
encounters.desc: In the woods at night, goblins hold a market of their own.

encounters.name: aylesmeade market
encounters.desc: From spring spices to dwarven garnets, all manner of luxuries are bartered at the fair.

encounters.name: tinker's wagon
encounters.desc: Tinker wagons from distant lands creak along the roads, to trade their wares at the fair.

locales.name: aylesmeade fair
locales.desc: Each spring Aylesmeade holds its fabled fair in sight of the World Tree, Aesilwyr.

locales.name: tree of fate
locales.desc: At the center of the world the great idrasil stretches to the heavens.
locales.flavor: A single seed once fell from Yggrasil.

furniture.name: maypole
furniture.desc: Raise a maypole to perform spring rituals.

furniture.name: beehive
furniture.desc: A small hive for keeping bees.

dungeons.name: hidden wilds
dungeons.desc: A land of magic beasts, unknown to your lore.
dungeons.title: Tamer of Wilds

dungeons.name: sunny fields of stone

start.desc: Returning from the fair you receive reports of fields overrun by great serpents and lizards. It may bear investigation.

dungeons.desc: The fields you remember from former days are now overrun with fearsome beasts.
dungeons.title: Sunny Champion
dungeons.flavor: Every budding mage needs to die somewhere.
